def lighten_blend_8(base: List[List[int]], active: List[List[int]]) -> List[List[int]]:
    # Calculate the blended matrix using matrix_where with the appropriate condition
    blended_matrix = matrix_where(
        base,
        active,
        lambda b, a: a if b < a else b
    )

    # Return the blended matrix
    return blended_matrix
